main.name: Soroosh Ansarimehr
main.description: Technically minded professional with hands-on experience designing, developing, testing, implementing, and maintaining software and systems supporting business and technology applications
main.bio: Knowledgeable and fully trained in Node.js, React (MERN Stack), Angular (MEAN Stack), ASP.NET C#, and Hybrid Mobile Applications (Ionic and Cordova). Proven success in building 20+ Web, Android, and iOS Applications for different startups and companies, executing web site security measures, and offering innovative solutions to complex issues. Instrumental in defining and employing procedures for ongoing web site revision. Expert in the development of up-to-date, high quality, and innovative software solutions. Adept at writing code that improves website accessibility, user experience, performance, and operational functionality. Solid analytical, technical, & communication skills with ability to work well in a team environment.

resume.skillmessage: Website Design & Development / Software Development / Web Application Testing / Issues Resolution Front-end Development / Project Management / Database Development / Requirement Gathering Object-oriented Programming / Solutions Development / Installation & Configuring / Deep Learning

work.company: TERTIARY COURSE MALAYSIA, Kuala Lampur, Malaysia
work.title: Trainer
work.description: Provide training to various candidates on different technical programing languages, environments, and web technologies to improve their skills and knowledge. Plan and conduct trainings on multiple courses, including Basic Node.js, Express.js, Full MEAN Stack, MicroServices with Node.js, Python 3, deep learning, and machine learning with TensorFlow. Apply best learning practices while instructing courses such as basic python training for beginners, basic unity game development training, Augmented Reality (AR) Mobile App Development, and unreal engine essential training.

work.title: Full-Stack Web developer
work.description: Use Node.js, Express.js, NestJs, React, GraphQL, Angular, Ionic, and MongoDB to design and develop different web sites as well as create databases supporting web applications and web sites. Evaluate and assess user needs to identify technical requirements, write code for web applications/web sites, and design web site security measures to protect data and information. Research and select different options in accordance with client or user requirements for web architecture or technologies. Install, configure, and maintain hypertext transfer protocol (HTTP) servers and related operating systems.

work.title: Full-Stack Web developer
work.description: Designed, built, and maintained various web sites by using Node.js, Express.js, NestJs, Angular, Ionic, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL. Examined website requirements and specification to select best suitable programming languages, design tools, or applications. Collated required information and technical considerations that need to incorporate into web site design plans such as budgets, equipment, performance requirements, or legal issues. Researched, documented, and selected alternatives for web architecture or technologies. Demonstrated attention to detail skills while installing and configuring hypertext transfer protocol (HTTP) servers and associated operating systems. Reviewed code to confirm validity and proper structuring of code as well as fulfilment of industry standards.

work.company: SHIRAZ DOURANDISH CO., Shiraz, Fars, Iran
work.title: Web Developer
work.description: Designed, developed, and improved web sites using ASP.NET MVC, C#, SQL Server, Node.js, Express.js, AngularJs, IonicJs, and MongoDB. Sourced and selected potential candidates and delivered training to boost performance. Conducted detailed analysis of all systems charts and programs prior to implementation. Monitored and reviewed the performance and work of systems analysts, programmers, and other computer-related workers. Contributed efforts as a part of a project team and adeptly managed database development activities. Collected required information to share detailed descriptions of web site specifications such as product features, software, communication protocols, activities, programming languages, and software/hardware.

skills.name: MongoDB / MS SQL Server / PostgreSQL / SQLite

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
